data.Area1_stg0_I: You and your crew stubble across on what appears to be like an abandoned shelter.
data.Area1_stg1_F: The inspection was a fail, our crew mate never returned and we have no information on this area.
data.Area1_stg1_S: The inspection was a success, the area is safe and has 8 fuel and y9 supplies for scavenge.
data.Area1_stg2_F: The search was a fail, we lost 8 crew members to a polar bear. The rest barely made it out alive.
data.Area1_stg2_S: The search was a success, in this process we gained 8 fuel and y9 supplies.
data.Inspect: Send one soul to inspect and get a solid report of the area.
data.Search: Send your crew to scavenge for fuel and supplies.
data.Leave: It is to risky let's try another time when its safe.
data.Scout: We could try and find the lost soul, but there is no guarantee.
data.Investigate: Send your crew to find out what the problem is?
data.Abandon: Definitely not worth going in there.
data.Collect: Send your crew to collect fuel and supplies.
data.Flee: Well that was catastrophic but could have been worse.
data.Done: Nothing left to do but leave the area.
data.Ice1_stg0_I: Your ship has stubled towards a large ice block. What should we do with it?
data.Ice2_stg0_I: Your ship has stubled towards a medium ice block. What should we do with it?
data.Ice3_stg0_I: Your ship has stubled towards a small ice block. What should we do with it?
data.Analyze: Check if it is safe to break that ice.
data.Mine: Send your crew to break the ice to make way for your ship.
data.Ignore: Probably not worth trying to break it.
data.EmptyFuel: We have run out of fuel onboard. Without fuel, we cannot move or keep our crew warm. What are your orders captain?
data.EmptySupply: Our food rations have been diminished and we have nothing to feed our crew with. The crew morale will slowly deteriorate.
data.EmptyMorale: The crew morale has dwelled beyond the no point of no return. Every single soul on board has decided to abandon the ship in an attempt to make it out on foot.
data.Find Fuel: If you have supplies use them as fuel.
